RESPONSE TEXT: Well, it's a bit of a story. I used to live at a settlement west of here. We got hit by Colter and his gang, back when he had one.
It was a tough fight. We killed some of theirs, they killed some of ours. There were wounded on both sides, but nobody could get to them.
I called out for a cease fire on the condition that I'd see to their injuries as well as ours. Saved a few lives that day, including Colter's.
When he set up this place, he came back for me. Said if I came along, he'd make sure his guys wouldn't hit our settlement again.
Now this place is my home.
Anyway, anything can I do for you? Treatment or supplies?
